name: web_automation
description: Run browser automation on a URL using TinyFish Web Agent. Give a URL and a natural-language goal (e.g. extract product names and prices). Returns structured JSON when the automation completes. Requires TINYFISH_API_KEY. Use for scraping, form filling, or multi-step web tasks.

goal.description: Natural language description of what to accomplish on the website

browser_profile.description: lite = standard browser, stealth = anti-detection browser
